data.name: DIY VR: VR Girl Mods Tool
data.detailed_description:
Get ready to face "DIY MY DY (VR Version)" the most exciting DLC "DIY: VR Girl Mods Tool". This expansion pack provides a large number of expandable resources, which is convenient for users to add into their own "DIY MY LADY" world.

main features

[Expand the fun of the game]
It is convenient for players to arrange the game according to their own preferences, to meet the game personality of different players, and to truly create a personal favorite DIY VR world.

[Huge resource library]
The government has prepared a large number of model resources to store in the cloud, and players can download them to the game at any time to create and expand their DIY world.

[Unparalleled scalability]
Doesn't meet the official model? It doesn't matter, we support players to upload their favorite model resources to dress up and expand their DIY world anytime, anywhere. Meet the needs of personalized expansion.

Game operation method
In order to have a better gaming experience, this program currently only supports the PC version.

fullgame.name: DIY MY LADY IN VR WORLD

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Arabic, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Celeron 1.5(1.5G) or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
